import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './statusboard.scss' import {createBrowserRouter} from "react-router-dom"; const StatusBoard = (props) => { const [namesOfColumns, setNamesOfColumns] = useState([]) const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3002/board-titles') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((name) => setNamesOfColumns(name)) .then((name) => console.log(name)) fetch("http://localhost:3002/board-data") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setData(data)) .then((data) => console.log(data)) }, []) return (
{props.title}
{ props.dataOfTools.map((img_link,index) => (
) )}
{data.map(({ellipse, img_link}, index) => ( ))}
{namesOfColumns.map(({title, vector},index) => ( ))} {data.map(({company, position, duration, job_id, status},index) => ( ))}
{title}
{company} {position} {duration} {job_id} {status}
{data.map(({points}, index) => ( ))}
); } export default StatusBoard;
